metadata.name: VeeamBackup Database Credentials Dump Via Sqlcmd.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects dump of credentials in VeeamBackup dbo

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\sqlcmd.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('select')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('top')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('[veeambackup].[dbo].[credentials]')))

output.summary: Detects dump of credentials in VeeamBackup dbo
